website_summaries.verdict: A dual-action digestive support product that has earned a loyal customer following for the benefits it delivers. The combination of enzymes and probiotics works well for many dogs and cats that are prone to stomach issues.
pros: Contains both enzymes and probiotics that boost digestion and calm sensitive stomachs
May decrease episodes of vomiting in some pets
Only a small amount is needed for noticeable results in most pets
cons: Some dogs and cats don't like it
Tends to get clumpy once moist if not sprinkled evenly over food

customer_reviews.title: price point makes them far more affordable and I actually believe these are working slightly better for him
customer_reviews.text: The probiotics and enzymes I was using for my GSP's gut issues had gotten ridiculously expensive so gave these a try. Have had no problems with him not eating with the changeover, price point makes them far more affordable and I actually believe these are working slightly better for him. Pretty pleased thus far. No bloating, gas, diarrhea or even loose stools. Also love that this product is derived from a plant based source and NOT animal based.
customer_reviews.author: Linnae

customer_reviews.title: Most definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs tummies were just not right and my bigger dog was ravenous all of the time. No matter how much more I’d feed her, it just wasn’t enough. She also had trouble gaining weight. I used to use this and stopped. That’s when I noticed they started having issues. They’ve been back on for a couple of months and they both look great and same to feel good all the time. Also my bigger girl’s ear was getting inflamed. All gone! Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie M.

customer_reviews.title: Stool eating and Anal Glands fixed!
customer_reviews.text: I have been ( my dog ) using this product for about 6 months now. She is 110lb Dog that has had constant anal gland issues. Nothing would fix it. I have always worked in the animal field so I know what it takes to help. It has been about 7 months since my dog has needed her analysis glands expressed AND it has also stopped her from stool eating. ( yes gross I know ) The dosing for my 110lb dog is 1 Teaspoon daily mixed into food. 1 Bottle lasts a long time. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Really helped our dog
customer_reviews.text: One of our dogs would frequently have the runs and/or vomit. He seemed in good health otherwise and the vet found nothing specific wrong. She recommended this product as a supplement. We add a bit of the supplement every day with his breakfast and dinner and it has made a world of difference. He is much, much better. He still has issues, but it is once or twice a month rather than once or twice a day. He feels so much better (and a lot fewer messes to clean up).
customer_reviews.author: L. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yr old Golden Retriever was losing weight rapidly and was always hungry. I began putting this on her food 6 weeks ago and at her recheck exam yesterday, her weight is up 9 pounds. She feels good and is very active for her age. The vet is very pleased and my dog will remain on this product.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Great dietary supplemtent
customer_reviews.text: I divide the daily dose for my cats between their two meals. There seems to be no scent or flavour so they don't even seem to notice it. I was advised that because we feed out pets "dead" food, they aren't getting the natural enzymes they would get in a more natural diet. I have an immune compromised adopted feral cat and I'm glad to have this product to help keep him healthy.
customer_reviews.author: JesseNYC

customer_reviews.title: Resolves my dogs itching
customer_reviews.text: My dog was licking his paws raw. I tried all kinds of things, and supplemented coconut oil, ground flax seed, had him on a homemade raw diet, which helped but didn’t really fix. These enzymes seem to be doing the trick. His paws are healing, and scratching less.
customer_reviews.author: teb

customer_reviews.title: Great product- helped our puppy quickly-will continue to use
customer_reviews.text: Great product- Works Great! The GSD puppy we adopted from shelter was having diarrhea with almost every elimination. Either all diarrhea or normal followed by diarrhea. We saw great results after only three days on the enzymes and the great results still continue. I am thankful for this product and for the reviews left by others.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this probiotic and Colon Rescue for my 3lb chihuahua with colitis. As long as I don't stray from her restricted diet and I mix these products in with her food she seems to be doing better. I've tried several different products and treatment and this is the first time I feel like I see improvement for her. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Vet Recommended, Owner Approved
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving Animal Essentials Plant Enzymes & Probiotics to my dogs for a number of years and have been happy with the results. When I adopted an elderly Lab, who had very loose stools, I decided to put her on this product and was delighted to find that the enzymes combined with a better diet resulted in smaller, well formed stools, much less shedding and a softer, shinier coat. I am now buying this in a large size from Amazon because my vet charges a fortune for it and I am giving it to two large dos and a cat.
customer_reviews.author: L. Burr

customer_reviews.title: Gypsum is the main ingredient.
customer_reviews.text: This product is primarily gypsum. It looks like chalk, tastes like chalk and my dog hates it. I’m not sure how feeding your dog the main ingredient in sheet rock it could be good for him.
customer_reviews.author: ShineySquirrel

customer_reviews.title: it works well
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased because my puppy, dog was having a lot of gas and stinky farts and burping. Once I started him on Animal Essentials Plant Enzymes & Probiotics the gas and farts, burping stopped. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON HARTMAN

customer_reviews.title: STUFF WORKS AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: My cat no longer vomits at all. This stuff is amazing. I highly recommend if you are having trouble with your cat vomiting after they eat.
customer_reviews.author: rch316

customer_reviews.title: My dog was allergic
customer_reviews.text: This product might work fine but I wasn’t able to find out. My dog has allergies and yeast problems, he gets ear infections and yeast infections in his paws frequently. This product contains a probiotic strain from mold which will inflame dogs with yeast problems. Not a problem with all dogs, but anyone with yeasty dogs probably want to go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work for my Jack Russell mix who had gerd and loose stools. Vet gave her an antibiotic for 2 weeks and Purina Pro Plan enzyme/probiotic. She is better, not cured. Her breath is no longer foul but everytime we stop the antibiotic the stools get loose again. Still have some episodes of nausea and licking. Going to try another probiotic before going on antibiotics again. Wish us luck.
customer_reviews.author: F. Gamel

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but mislabeled or misdelivered by Amazon twice in a row
customer_reviews.text: Great product that really helps out job. However, Amazon customer service has been poor. We ordered "Animal Essentials AS-4000040-2 300 g (Pack of 2) Herbal Green Alternative Dog and Cat Supplement" but only received 1 bottle, despite clearly being marked "Pack of 2". We got customer support assistance, returned the first item, and had exactly the same single pack sent out again. Extremely frustrating. Trying this one more time.
customer_reviews.author: KARL MITCHELL

customer_reviews.title: Kitty did not take it very well
customer_reviews.text: My 1yr old cat never had vomiting problems. Occasionally he’d had hard stools so I gave him enzyme which seemed to be helping. I just received this brand so I gave it to him as directed. He immediately puked big time after eating. It’s not a very good experience! My carpet now looks terrible even after I used stain remover.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent health supplment
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great, handles all of my dogs digestive problems. She's a rescue and SUPER PICKY. I add this to her Open Farms food every night and she eats it no problem. She never gets sick or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, I have four dogs and they all take this product for digestive issues. They have been using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: The seller only shipped me half of my order.
customer_reviews.text: The listing says, "Animal Essentials AS-4000040-2 300 g (Pack of 2) Herbal Green Alternative Dog and Cat Supplement" however, I only received one bottle even though the listing says the listing is a pack of two (implying I will receive two bottles.)
customer_reviews.author: Tim Chung

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the advice of a friend that had given this to their dog. It is not easy to find a probiotic for animals that did not have extra unwanted things in it. It worked not only for my puppy but the older dog and the cats.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dinkins

customer_reviews.title: This is the 4th Probiotic Ive tried --it's worked!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a rescue with stomach issues, it worked very well!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lieb

customer_reviews.title: Using for Years
customer_reviews.text: Been using for three years. Her checkup at the Vets comes out good.
customer_reviews.author: DRAGONBONES

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for many years. I put it on y dog's food daily. Like humans, dogs also benefit from getting probiotics and enzymes. My dogs doesn't notice that it on her food.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Hype no Bite
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't see a real difference in my dog. Used it about 2 weeks, kept in refrigerator like it said and gave with every meal. Dog ate it up without a problem so that was easy, I thought I would try something new, but, I'm sticking to the NatureVet with pre and probiotics; little bit higher in price, but, doesn't have to be refrigerated and works well for my dog. My dog was diagnosed with Giardia last year and is still having trouble with digestion; very sensitive stomach. NatureVet is the only thing that I have found to help him. UPDATE 2013-present: Now I give all my dogs Nzymes and they have never been healthier...
customer_reviews.author: Seaturtle

customer_reviews.title: Meh.... does it do anything??!
customer_reviews.text: I sprinkle this onto my cat's wet food much below the 1/8 t amount listed for cats and they still seem to notice it and aren't keen on it. I still try to work it in on occasion just to help their systems but I won't be buying it again. Nothing major noted in my cat's behaviors either as far as skin issues etc.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Regie

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I was recommend this product by my holistic vet and it's good stuff. My dog prefers a different probiotic but I would still highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KR Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Well worth every penny if you love your animals
customer_reviews.text: We use this for all cats & dogs at our home including our foster kitties and feral colony. This makes a big difference in health, coat, and best of all stops the dogs from consuming "kitty rocca" IF you get my meaning! Simple to use...we mix into food bags as we open them. For canned food we use a salt shaker for a tiny sprinkle
customer_reviews.author: Brenda R. Sours

customer_reviews.title: Lots of probiotics here good value
customer_reviews.text: Please have helped my animals digestive system and poop is no longer runny... will definitely buy again there's a lot in here!
customer_reviews.author: Janis L. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: No more dog poots
customer_reviews.text: Been giving this to my cats and dogs for a month now. Kitties fur is silky soft and shiny. Dogs are not shedding as bad. Best thing- NO DOGGIE POOTS! Woohoo!!! Two labs that fart are nasty. This is good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi33

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's too early to tell.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure I can tell a difference with my dog taking this. She seems to eat around it if possible and she is still eating grass and her feet are still plagued with sores.
customer_reviews.author: COLTOJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Keep refrigerated
customer_reviews.text: Great product for probiotics and enzymes - but keep refrigerated. The bottle says that, but it’s in tiny print so easily missed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: This is the only one I'd found that had both enzymes and probiotics in powdered form at great price. Plus
customer_reviews.text: My dog has megaesophagus, and I've been putting it in his food every day, hoping at least some of it stays in there. This is the only one I'd found that had both enzymes and probiotics in powdered form at great price. Plus, it's lactose and sugar free!
customer_reviews.author: Curious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This product is a fine powder. I wasn't sure what to expect when ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a fine powder. I wasn't sure what to expect when I purchased it. My dogs seem to like it although I am mixing it with some canned food for them. I think it will be some time before I see if there are benefits in my dog's health but in the meantime I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: StaBug

customer_reviews.title: price DOUBLED!? Why
customer_reviews.text: purchased last year and price is now double. Don't understand
customer_reviews.author: Christopher S.

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It is a reasonably economical product providing relief and resolution of my dog's bowel issues. I can't attest to flavor or scent as to me it has none, but it certainly has no negative impact on my dog enjoying her food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Cat doesn't even know it's on his food.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a pet on antibiotics. His digestive system is out of whack and I just sprinkle this on his food, he gobbles it up and his poo is once again formed.
customer_reviews.author: Katz1

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by the owner of a natural pet food store near me, and it has worked great for us. I include it in my large-breed dog's meals, and he always has regular solid stools. Apparently the powder is tasteless, and that seems to be the case because my dog never minds eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy trails

customer_reviews.title: Great for our pups
customer_reviews.text: We have 5 dogs and we use this daily on each one. Helps keep our pups healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Wojos1

customer_reviews.title: Holistic vet recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for your dog or cat. Sprinkle it on food and be sure to keep it refrigerated after opening. Our holistic vet approved it. She said it has the enzymes needed esp if you want a product without animal additives.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Product great, customer service better
customer_reviews.text: Several things to like about this product, including that it is not carried in lactose (as many popular enzyme supplements are) that can be problematic to some sensitive dogs. Selection of enzymes used is well rounded. But probably the best feature of this (and all Animal Essentials products) is the access to great, responsive customer service right from the manufacturer. They've always answered my questions quickly and completely. My order was placed through Amazon and was fulfilled and shipped by The Whole Healthy Pet. I found there price competitive, and the product arrived quickly and in perfect condition. Would recommend them and definitely use again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Reese

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't feel like the product was working as well as it should have. Too bad, after all the positive reviews i wanted this product to work. We have used thebefore and that has worked well. Because of the higher price of both of these i switched toand they have been working great, and less mess to boot because they come in capsule form that i just drop in his food (he is a lab and hasn't minded the taste of any of the probiotics he has ever had, whether it be the powder or a capsule). At least i found an option that works better and is cheaper as well for my dog. Try the Vetri-Mega first and see.
customer_reviews.author: BlackSwan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy that I purchase this
customer_reviews.text: This product is the only one that stopped my cat with chronic pancreatitis and IBD from having diarrhea. Very happy that I purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: No problems
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how much this really helps. My dog's are in poor health. I still give them the probiotic that I have always used.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy McCook

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my cat.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my frequently vomiting cat. He rarely does now.
customer_reviews.author: J. Silver

customer_reviews.title: No significant improvement
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't see any significant improvement or difference in my dogs. I used it for over 6 months. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie J. Nover

customer_reviews.title: Revised review
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for several years. Essential if your dog has digestion issues. Added 10/1/19 Stop putting label over feeding instructions and expiration date. Very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Cats won't eat it.  :(
customer_reviews.text: I sprinkle a little of this on their food and they won't eat. I looks like flour in the bottle. It makes a gross gooey mess on the inside of the bowls. Many great reviews for this was the reason I purchased but my cats (3 of them) don't like it. I use FortiFlora and they gobble that right up.
customer_reviews.author: Dawny

customer_reviews.title: Didn't notice any difference in my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for weeks and haven't noticed any difference in my dogs. I think I am just making an expensive "dog waste product".
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: It works great helping my cat's digestion
customer_reviews.text: It works great helping my cat's digestion. Started using it after she had a round of antibiotics, but decided it's continuing to be a good thing for her.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good for allergic dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog has bad allergies and this is the only thing that takes them away. Have to have it!
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I notice my dog's poo is more normal and regular. He has some issues before.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for quite some time now for my Aussie with food sensitivities. It works quite well for her and I will continue to use these probiotics. The price is great, at about $10 less than my local pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Constance A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product have used for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Great product have used for a long time. Getting ready to buy again. Best product I have used for my dog with digestive issues.
customer_reviews.author: Irma M. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this to my dogs for about 2 years and have had great success with it. They have firm, healthy stools, no digestive upsets, and healthy, shiny coats. When I first started giving it, I found that they would get loose stools if I gave too much too soon, so I started them on small amounts and slowly increased the dosage with no problems. A couple of months ago, I thought they didn't need it any more so I stopped giving it to them when the bottle was empty. Big mistake! Within a week, both dogs had loose stools and one dog threw up twice. Back on they went and no problems since.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Lover

customer_reviews.title: My dogs have use probiotics for many years.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have use probiotics for many years. Our vet said a healthy gut is one of the most important ways to keep my boys healthy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps break down food in digestive track
customer_reviews.text: This product helps my dog digest his food. He had many problems with keeping his food down even several hours after he would eat. This product helps him by breaking down in the digestive tract. He has not had a problem with throwing up his food since I have had him on this product. This has been for a few years now. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Caused Vomiting
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this, but one by one all three of my animals started puking. Made one of my cats very itchy and constipated too. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Miran D. Elseewi

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this product
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product to everyone in my rescue group, especially those with cats that have fussy stomachs. My sphynx started using this with a flare-up from her IBD. In the last year I added the other cats in my home and the dog to using this product. We foster dogs as well and I include this in their meals also. It really helps with stress-induced stomach issues including diarrhea. My animals seem healthier in general and much more regular with their BMs. The sphynx can get soft stools and doesn't use the litter box reliably if her tummy is causing trouble. She has had only 1 flare-up/accident since starting this.
customer_reviews.author: Gustav's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This product saved my dog!! She had been having bacterial skin infections for months and no antibiotic from the vet was helping her. I decided to go an all natural route to heal her. I got this probiotic product and some organic apple cider vinegar. In the last month her skin has cleared up, hair is growing back and she isn't as itchy!
customer_reviews.author: Misstea15

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't be without it.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this for years. It took care of my schnauzer's irritable bowel syndrome. Wouldn't be without it. I give it to all my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Link

customer_reviews.title: Helped our boy
customer_reviews.text: Our Catahoula was prone to getting stomach infections and these did a great job at helping regulate his stomach. I just tossed them into his food bowl with breakfast and he ate them up.
customer_reviews.author: Addie15

customer_reviews.title: Animal Essentials Plant Enzymes & Probiotics
customer_reviews.text: I found the answer to my prayers in this product. A Cat I fostered and later kept always had the stinkiest poo, and did not cover it. He ate more than he needed, which lead me to believe he was not getting the proper nutrients from his food.I tried different foods, no luck. After 2 weeks of the Animal Essentials Plant Enzymes & Probiotics I could see and smell a difference. I give him a daily dose, as I found I could not stop it or the negative results would comwe back. BEST STUFF OUT THERE For MY CAT !!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D. Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hounds!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing for my dog's digestive tract is this product it keeps them healthy. I Have used this product for years and will continue to do so. It arrived on time and in good condition, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Dekking

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Very good indeed. We have a Bassett hound pup who had constant diarrhoea and after many trips to vet with lots of costs and no results we read up online and decided to try this, we really had nothing to loose. Best money we ever spent. Would strongly recommend this to anyone having problems with their dogs digestive system. Once again it was the best money we ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline Donaghy

customer_reviews.title: A great product to add into your dogs diet
customer_reviews.text: A great product to add into your dogs diet, especially if they can't handle dairy. We do cottage cheese and yogurt too!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great price, much cheaper than getting at the pet store a few miles away. I give this to my dog every day and it works wonders for her system

customer_reviews.title: Dig Indigestion
customer_reviews.text: This helps both my Lab/Ridgeback mix & French Bulldogs digestion. It reduced my Frenchie's very odiferous releases of gas!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Stops the excess gas problem right away, makes everyone's tummy happy.

customer_reviews.title: Beneficial for stomach problems
customer_reviews.text: These enzymes really help my senior dog with stomach problems. I just sprinkle over her food.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. My second order and will order again. Good price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: T Mac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and priced far below similar products. I use this with all my dogs (3) and this is my fourth of fifth bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Sanders, author of the Amazon Bestselling Memoir: A Matter of Panache

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product
customer_reviews.text: Ever since my dog bloated requiring surgery, I have been very paranoid about what she eats. She exclusively is on a diet of Ziwipeak venison, which is almost pure meat. I have been adding 1/4 tsp of this powder to her food twice a day for the past 5 years. I am not positive it makes a difference but I am sure it helps with digestion. She has never had any digestive issues so I feel confident the probiotics are doing a good job. One bottle lasts many months. When we travel, I weigh her food and mix it with the probiotics prior to packaging in individual zip lock mini bags.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick. He couldn't take it My ...
customer_reviews.text: Made my dog sick.He couldn't take it My younger dog wouldn't eat her foodwith this on it.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: May Be a Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this product. I used it for my older diabetic cat with digestive issues. I did not see any improvement, but this might work for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: dogwalker

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended by our Holistic Vet
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by our Holistic Vet. My dog does not mind the powder added to her wet food. We've been using this product for over 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: M. Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful digestive supplement
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful digestive supplement. I use it to make sure my dogs can digest their regular food, and anything I switch them to.
customer_reviews.author: Illiena Volynskaya

customer_reviews.title: Extremely helpful supplement
customer_reviews.text: Been adding a sprinkle to our Boston Terrier's raw food for 4 years. He's very healthy, no gas and his breath is fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Had originally got this stuff from our vet Then refilled through Amazon and the Probiotic was exactly the same for probably half the cost. We would always come home to find some vomit on the carpet until we started using this probiotic. Now months of having a vomit free dog. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Kuskoman

customer_reviews.title: Great for all dogs
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product originally because our dogs were experiencing some upset tummies. I now keep the enzymes and probiotics in the house at all times to help prevent any upset stomachs. I give this to them on weekly basis to assist with digestion. It's perfect for all dogs because it is a tasteless powder that can easily be added to food. We have three Chihuahuas. One of them tends to eat anything she can find on the street, and a lot of the time I only see it after she has it in her mouth and is swallowing. So I give her this with her meals and she feels just fine no matter what she ate.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps
customer_reviews.text: I have a 9yo Rhodesian Ridgeback that has always had loose bowels and occasional diarrhea. Ever since I started using this (I'm on my 4th or 5th bottle now), he has had very firm stool and very little diarrhea. I use this in conjunction with Barlean's Flaxseed oil to give him Omega 3 fatty acids. So for each meal, I sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon on his food and then squirt the flaxseed oil on it and mix it up. He gobbles up his food every time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Used this for years.
customer_reviews.text: This goes in every meal of my pets! No grumbling tummy sounds ever
customer_reviews.author: Ray &Terry

customer_reviews.title: Started giving these to my dog for ongoing digestive issues ...
customer_reviews.text: Started giving these to my dog for ongoing digestive issues. It does seem to help and he likes the taste.
customer_reviews.author: agilx242

customer_reviews.title: Good Science
customer_reviews.text: While I dont think it's a miracle product and & didn't clear up my lab/spaniel's chronic ear infections it does seem to do its job. My dog has a sensitive stomach & a couple times a week had very liquidy BMs. Additionally about once a month I would come home to doggie diarrhea in my apt. Since starting this my 2 months ago my dog has had no accidents and BMs are solid & regular- which makes me very happy.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for doggy's with tummy issues
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have had a tummy problem most of their life. I have switched their food so many times I can not count. When we took our pup in and they said that we had to put her on medicated dog food that cost a ton we were like okay. After we put her on this food not too long after they started having issues again. We purchased this probiotic and it was like night and day. They have sorry for the TMI amazing stools that are nice and firm. I also was able to switch them back to Wellness which is what they liked the best and have not seen any issues since. Great product!

customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gas and diarrhea gone
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs has had diarrhea issues from day 1. Moving to venison food helped, but he would still relapse, and always had terrible gas, disrupting many a dinner from under the table. He has been on these enzymes for a couple years now, and his stools are consistently nice and firm. Now it's a rare day that he perfumes dinner. All the dogs in our household are on these enzymes, and now it's a big (unpleasant) surprise when one of them passes gas, not a normal occurrence. We are so happy! Dogs... you gotta love 'em.

customer_reviews.title: kitty all better
customer_reviews.text: After spending a gazillion dollars at the vet during half a dozen visits for poking and prodding and testing and severely traumatizing my poor kitty, there was still no improvement of the constant diarrhea. A local pet food deli suggested this product. It worked like a charm. Kitty is all better. I fired the vet. Try it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Stoianova

customer_reviews.title: Good product and inexpensive....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my older cat (12-13 yrs old) which seems to help with her digestion and made her stools better & firmer, not to mention she doesn't vomit as much as she used to sometimes after eating. From what I have researched, older cats do tend to have more of a problem digesting since their pancreas doesn't produce enough enzymes to aid with proper digestion. I have used this for about a year and will be buying more soon (1 bottle has lasted over a year). Great inexpensive price. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Helps rid dogs of awful gas...
customer_reviews.text: I use probiotics myself and felt my dogs could benefit as well. I have been using Animal Essentials for 7 years and Amazon has the best price. If we don't use this or run out, I notice my dogs have much more gas and their stools are not as well formed. I definitely recommend this, especially if your dog has gas or digestive issues. The dog I originally began purchasing this for has now passed, but he had awful digestion issues. This product and a more natural diet largely fixed his issues. We continue to use it for our other dogs and like I stated, it helps with their stools and gas.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a tasteless enzyme & probiotic product!
customer_reviews.text: One of my pups is incredibly picky and is not a fan of liver or "meat flavored" supplements. It was very difficult giving him the digestive enzymes and probiotics that I knew he needed, since it seemed that they all had some sort of flavoring added. I was SO HAPPY to find this Animal's Essential's Plant Enzymes & Probiotics supplement! Now, all of my pets get their enzymes and probiotics and I don't have to buy different products to suit each taste. Fabulous!

product_meta.title: Animal Essentials Plant Enzyme & Probiotics Supplement for Dogs & Cats, 10.6 oz
product_meta.description: Animal Essentials' Plant Enzymes & Probiotics relieves the extra burden placed on the digestive system by breaking down fats, carbohydrates, cellulose and protein. It contains a blend of plant and microbial produced enzymes, none of which come from animal sources. Animal derived enzymes will work in only one area of the digestive system (stomach and intestines), while plant and microbial enzymes work throughout the whole system. Since our enzymes also work over a broader pH range they are active longer in the entire digestive process, reducing the food into usable components.
feature_bullets: Aids in digestion and absorption of nutrients critical to good health.
Helps to eliminate waste and toxins
